S.FORM: laluma'an nu Matel i Tuen(Amilika a kamu: House Nymeros Martell of Sunspear , Hulan a kamu: ) u cacay a laluma'an nu giki, dadiw nu sulda atu lamal(Amilika: A Song of Ice and Fire), u nisangaan nu misulitay ci George Raymond Richard Martin, u kungku nu nilalamelan nu laylay atu malawlaay nadatengan. izaw ku pituay a pu nu ulic nu nida. malagiki nu HBO i 2011 a mihcaan. laylay nu laluma'an nu Matel namakay i lekelikenan a bunga a sililinay a luma' ci Nameylos Matel, i nidebungan nu Antal a tedemaw tu Weystelo a lala' tayda i Tuen cinida, ci Mukan Matel ku mukeliday, muladay tu hitay nida micidakay atu lalangawan ayda a kasahenulay a tademaw tu laluma'an nu Matel Tulang Nameylos Matel Upelin Nameylos Matel Eylalia Sent malalitin tu ihekaay atu zumaay a natinengan nasulitan ni Padakaw Lami' 2020. u Wipsay nu misulitay ci Georgr RR Martin manamuhay a Wikipayke dadiw nu sulda atu lamal
